Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

Please check eternet cable is properly connected. If it is connected  properly and light is showing behind CPU then restart the System.If it is not working then also raise a ticket so Engineer can be assigned to resolve the issue

patterns: can't see one side of display
responses: Please check VJI cable is properly connected. If it is connected  properly then restart the System once.If it is not working then also raise a ticket so Engineer can be assigned to resolve the issue

patterns: I have system Issue its not starting
responses: Please check all  the wire/cable is properly connected. If it is connected  properly then restart the System ones, if not then try force restart .Click Start button and then click Power button to force restart System.If it is not working then also raise a ticket so Engineer can be assigned to resolve the issue

Please check all  the wire/cable is properly connected. If it is connected  properly then restart the System ones, if not then try force restart.If it is not working then also raise a ticket so Engineer can be assigned to resolve the issue

patterns: System has  been lagging from start
System has  been hanging from start
responses: Close all the background softwares and restart the system.If it is not working then also raise a ticket so Engineer can be assigned to resolve the issue

patterns: Can't hear the sound from one side
responses: Please check if the mute button is on,if it is on please off and if still not working try upluging and plug again.If it is not working then also raise a ticket so Engineer can be assigned to resolve the issue

Please close the outlook and then start again, If not solved restart the System and login again if you update the password and check again.If it is not working then also raise a ticket so Engineer can be assigned to resolve the issue
